attributes.review: This app was horrible! It took several day to download and once I had downloaded it it had wiped my phone storage. It continues to deleted photos constantly and some of them are the only photos I have left of my grandmother!! Please DO NOT BUY THIS APP

attributes.review: This app is horrendous, the picture of an angry racist Cheeto explodes as I open it but shortly there after I see a losing campaign filled with non finished sentences almost like Alexa annotating for Michael Scott himself.
